snippet: An appeals panel upheld penalties levied against the crew chief for the five-time Nascar Sprint Cup champion Jimmie Johnson for failing the opening day inspection at the Daytona 500 last month.
abstract: Appeals panel upholds penalties levied against Jimmie Johnson's crew chief Chad Knaus for failing the opening day inspection at the Daytona 500.
lead_paragraph: An appeals panel upheld penalties levied against the crew chief for the five-time Nascar Sprint Cup champion Jimmie Johnson for failing the opening day inspection at the Daytona 500 last month.

headline.main: Johnson’s Crew Penalized For Daytona Infraction
headline.print_headline: Johnson’s Crew Penalized For Daytona Infraction
